column1: pdf printable version graveside services. friday june 12, 2015, 4 pm at staley cemetery visitation. thursday june 11, 2015, 6 - 8 pm at loflin funeral home facts. born: september 9, 1934. death: june 10, 2015. share your thoughts and memories about retha ferguson shaw in the guestbook. memorial donations. memorial donations can be made to:randolph county, po box 9, asheboro, nc 27204. or to cedar falls united methodist church, 1119 loflin pond rd., asheboro, nc 27203. memorial networks partner provider: batesville interactive, all rights reserved. funeral home website by batesville, inc. privacy terms of use
